attributes.action: That Ian Duncan Smith live, for at least 3 months (13 Weeks) in a Council Property in Scotland,paying all costs and buying food.
attributes.additional_details:
I want Ian Duncan Smith to visibly back up his claim that he can live on £53 a week allowance, whilst paying Rent on a Council Property, paying for utilities (Gas & Electricity) and Council Tax.

This, of course would be taking into account that he should be treated in the same way as a Single Person, who has no Disabilities and has just left the British Armed Forces. Just as anybody who has no Disabilities.

People with Disabilities and Long Term / Terminal Illnesses should also be shown more compassion; as should their families who share the same home.
